overview:
## Discussion

After creating a new session, assign its [doc://com.apple.automaticassessmentconfiguration/documentation/AutomaticAssessmentConfiguration/AEAssessmentSession/delegate] property before calling the [doc://com.apple.automaticassessmentconfiguration/documentation/AutomaticAssessmentConfiguration/AEAssessmentSession/begin()] method to start a session. Wait for the delegate to receive the [doc://com.apple.automaticassessmentconfiguration/documentation/AutomaticAssessmentConfiguration/AEAssessmentSessionDelegate/assessmentSessionDidBegin(_:)] call before starting an assessment.

# init(configuration:)

**Initializer**

Creates a new assessment session.

## Declaration

```swift
init(configuration: AEAssessmentConfiguration)
```

## Parameters

- **configuration**: Configuration information for the session.

## Discussion

After creating a new session, assign its [doc://com.apple.automaticassessmentconfiguration/documentation/AutomaticAssessmentConfiguration/AEAssessmentSession/delegate] property before calling the [doc://com.apple.automaticassessmentconfiguration/documentation/AutomaticAssessmentConfiguration/AEAssessmentSession/begin()] method to start a session. Wait for the delegate to receive the [doc://com.apple.automaticassessmentconfiguration/documentation/AutomaticAssessmentConfiguration/AEAssessmentSessionDelegate/assessmentSessionDidBegin(_:)] call before starting an assessment.
title: init(configuration:)
